title: Wolfram Language Testing Module for AgentGladiator Stability

reasoning.problem: Proposal: Allocate resources for development of a Wolfram Language Testing Module for AgentGladiator based on the Wolfram Deep Dive Report. This module will leverage Wolfram's computational capabilities to create a rigorous, automated testing suite to address the instability issues outlined in Evolutionary Axiom 2026-01-15 and prevent future AgentGladiator failures. The goal is to significantly improve agent reliability and system stability.
